title: Pregnancy after 35
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Down's syndrome
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Women - Interviews
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Pregnancy
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Pregnancy - Psychological aspects
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Middle aged women - Health and hygiene
description: Uses interviews with middle aged mothers and information from Carole S. McCauley's book, to allay the fears of women contemplating pregnancy after 35. Shows emotional and physical reactions to pregnancy at this age, discusses Down's syndrome and demonstrates an amniocentesis which test foetal chromosomes.
